sql.query:
SELECT id, user_id AS RT_id, user_fname, user_mobile, user_type, md_id, ds_id, scheme_id, aeps_balance, aeps_merchant_id, user_tpin, balance_amt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT benef_name, bank_ac, ifsc, address1, pincode, remarks
FROM aeps_beneficiary_cashfree
WHERE benef_id = :P1 /* {{$_POST.BenefIdBank}} */ AND parent_id = :P2 /* {{identity}} */

select mo.service_id, mc.operator_id, mc.comm_per, mc.comm_val, mc.service_charge_per, mc.service_charge_val, mo.operator_name 
from m_commission mc
left join m_operator mo on (mo.id=mc.operator_id)
left join m_service ms on (ms.id=mo.service_id)
where mc.scheme_id = @scheme_id and mo.min_amount::int <= @amount and mo.max_amount::int >=@amount and 
(mo.id=477 or mo.id=478 or mo.id=479 or mo.id=480 or mo.id=481 or mo.id=482) and ms.service_name ='Money';

SELECT id AS admin_id, user_id AS admin_user_id, user_fname AS admin_name, user_mobile AS admin_mobile, user_email AS admin_email, aeps_balance AS admin_aeps_balance, balance_amt AS admin_balance
FROM m_users
WHERE user_type = 0

SELECT id AS dt_id, user_fname AS dt_name, user_mobile AS dt_mobile, user_type AS dt_user_type, scheme_id AS dt_scheme_id, aeps_balance AS dt_aeps_balance, balance_amt AS dt_balance
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.ds_id}} */

SELECT m_api.api_code, m_api_forward.api_id
FROM m_api_forward
LEFT JOIN m_api AS m_api ON (m_api.id = m_api_forward.api_id)
WHERE m_api.api_type = :P1 /* {{'DMT'}} */

SELECT comm_per AS dt_comm_per, comm_val AS dt_comm_val, service_charge_per AS dt_charge_per, service_charge_val AS dt_charge_val
FROM m_commission
WHERE operator_id = :P1 /* {{GetOpComm[0].operator_id}} */ AND scheme_id = :P2 /* {{GetRTCreator.dt_scheme_id}} */

SELECT id AS mdt_id, user_fname AS mdt_name, user_mobile AS mdt_mobile, scheme_id AS mdt_scheme_id, aeps_balance AS mdt_aeps_bal, user_type AS mdt_user_type, balance_amt AS mdt_user_bal
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.md_id}} */

SELECT comm_per AS mdt_comm_per, comm_val AS mdt_comm_val, service_charge_per AS mdt_charge_per, service_charge_val AS mdt_charge_val
FROM m_commission
WHERE operator_id = :P1 /* {{GetOpComm[0].operator_id}} */ AND scheme_id = :P2 /* {{GetDTCreator.mdt_scheme_id}} */

values.value: {{'Withdrawal Amt: '+$_POST.WithdrawAmtBank+' | Benef. Id: '+$_POST.BenefIdBank+' | User Mobile: '+UserWalletBalCheck.user_mobile+' | Comm. Amt: '+RTCommAmt+' | Charge Amt: '+RTChargeAmt+' | Net Amt: '+RTNetAmt}}

sql.query:
INSERT INTO tt_recharge_trans
(op_id, service_id, api_id, user_id, user_number, details, opening_balance, amount, comm_per, comm_val, comm_amt, other_charge, charge_per, charge_amt, net_amt, closing_balance, tr_mode, tr_type, status, tr_id, reason, api_logs, revert_trans, ip_address, process_mode, live, tr_date, transaction_by, dtcommper, dtcommval, dtcommamt, dtchargeper, dtchargeval, dtchargeamt, mdtcommper, mdtcommval, mdtcommamt, mdtchargeper, mdtchargeval, mdtchargeamt, bank_ac_no, remitter_id, blank3) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetOpComm[0].operator_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetOpComm[0].service_id}} */, :P3 /* {{GetAPIForward.api_id}} */, :P4 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.id}} */, :P5 /* {{GetBeneficiary.bank_ac}} */, :P6 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.user_mobile}} */, :P7 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.balance_amt}} */, :P8 /* {{$_POST.WithdrawAmtBank}} */, :P9 /* {{GetOpComm[0].comm_per}} */, :P10 /* {{GetOpComm[0].comm_val}} */, :P11 /* {{RTCommAmt}} */, :P12 /* {{GetOpComm[0].service_charge_val}} */, :P13 /* {{GetOpComm[0].service_charge_per}} */, :P14 /* {{RTChargeAmt}} */, :P15 /* {{RTNetAmt}} */, :P16 /* {{RTClosingBalance}} */, :P17 /* {{'Web'}} */, :P18 /* {{'Cash'}} */, :P19 /* {{'PENDING'}} */, :P20 /* {{TransactionId}} */, :P21 /* {{'Withdrawal Amt: '+$_POST.WithdrawAmtBank+' | Benef. Id: '+$_POST.BenefIdBank+' | User Mobile: '+UserWalletBalCheck.user_mobile+' | Comm. Amt: '+RTCommAmt+' | Charge Amt: '+RTChargeAmt+' | Net Amt: '+RTNetAmt}} */, :P22 /* {{GetAPIForward.api_code}} */, :P23 /* {{0}} */, :P24 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P25 /* {{'A2C'}} */, :P26 /* {{'Live'}} */, :P27 /* {{NOW}} */, :P28 /* {{identity}} */, :P29 /* {{DTCommPer}} */, :P30 /* {{DTCommVal}} */, :P31 /* {{DTCommAmt}} */, :P32 /* {{DTChargePer}} */, :P33 /* {{DTChargeVal}} */, :P34 /* {{DTChargeAmt}} */, :P35 /* {{MDTCommPer}} */, :P36 /* {{MDTCommVal}} */, :P37 /* {{MDTCommAmt}} */, :P38 /* {{MDTChargePer}} */, :P39 /* {{MDTChargeVal}} */, :P40 /* {{MDTChargeAmt}} */, :P41 /* {{GetBeneficiary.bank_ac}} */, :P42 /* {{$_POST.BenefIdBank}} */, :P43 /* {{GetBeneficiary.benef_name}} */)

params.name: :P21
params.value: {{'Withdrawal Amt: '+$_POST.WithdrawAmtBank+' | Benef. Id: '+$_POST.BenefIdBank+' | User Mobile: '+UserWalletBalCheck.user_mobile+' | Comm. Amt: '+RTCommAmt+' | Charge Amt: '+RTChargeAmt+' | Net Amt: '+RTNetAmt}}

values.value: {{'Withdrawal of Rs. '+$_POST.WithdrawAmtBank+' from Bank | Comm. Amt. '+RTCommAmt+' | Charge Amt. '+RTChargeAmt+' | Net Amt. '+RTNetAmt+' | AEPS Wallet Remaining '+RTClosingBalance}}

sql.query:
INSERT INTO tt_balance
(user_id, old_balance, amount, new_balance, transaction_type, tr_date, ip_address, crdr_type, pay_ref_id, remarks, created_by, created_on, netamt, status) VALUES (:P1 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.id}} */, :P2 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.balance_amt}} */, :P3 /* {{$_POST.WithdrawAmtBank}} */, :P4 /* {{RTClosingBalance}} */, :P5 /* {{'Money Transfer'}} */, :P6 /* {{NOW}} */, :P7 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P8 /* {{'Debit'}} */, :P9 /* {{DMTRechTrans.identity}} */, :P10 /* {{'Withdrawal of Rs. '+$_POST.WithdrawAmtBank+' from Bank | Comm. Amt. '+RTCommAmt+' | Charge Amt. '+RTChargeAmt+' | Net Amt. '+RTNetAmt+' | AEPS Wallet Remaining '+RTClosingBalance}} */, :P11 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.id}} */, :P12 /* {{NOW}} */, :P13 /* {{RTNetAmt}} */, :P14 /* {{'PENDING'}} */)

params.name: :P10
params.value: {{'Withdrawal of Rs. '+$_POST.WithdrawAmtBank+' from Bank | Comm. Amt. '+RTCommAmt+' | Charge Amt. '+RTChargeAmt+' | Net Amt. '+RTNetAmt+' | AEPS Wallet Remaining '+RTClosingBalance}}

sql.query:
UPDATE m_users
SET balance_amt = :P1 /* {{RTClosingBalance}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.id}} */

options.data: Unauthorized Token, Contact Technical Support Team

sql.query:
UPDATE tt_recharge_trans
SET status = :P1 /* {{'SUCCESS'}} */, api_logs = :P2 /* {{api_log}} */, is_processed = :P3 /* {{is_processed}} */, operator_ref = :P4 /* {{'Transaction Successful'}} */, api_ref = :P5 /* {{api_ref}} */, api_response_id = :P6 /* {{apiResponseTime}} */
WHERE id = :P7 /* {{DMTRechTrans.identity}} */

UPDATE tt_balance
SET status = :P1 /* {{'SUCCESS'}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{AddttBalance.identity}} */

options.value: {{'SUCCESS: Transfer of Rs. '+$_POST.WithdrawAmtBank+'\n to the beneficiary Bank Account Successful.'}}

Id'+DMTRechTrans.identity}} */, :P12 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.id}} */, :P13 /* {{NOW}} */)

sql.query:
UPDATE m_users
SET balance_amt = :P1 /* {{MDTClosingBalance}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.md_id}} */

UPDATE tt_recharge_trans
SET status = :P1 /* {{Status}} */, closing_balance = :P2 /* {{UserWalletBalCheck.balance_amt}} */
WHERE id = :P3 /* {{DMTRechTrans.identity}} */

UPDATE tt_balance
SET status = :P1 /* {{Status}} */
WHERE pay_ref_id = :P2 /* {{DMTRechTrans.identity}} */
